author: ratz
title: fat, ugly, fast.
review:
well, not that i desperately looked for that bike, but it was so cheap i couldn't resist, and i still don't regret having bought it. thats not because of the rather average parts selection, but because the really strong pull-back-motor, that povides lots of fun to my kids and myself. you can even let it jump over ramps, and it will land safely and drive on, that's something!
so it's a players, not a collectors item i suppose.

author: Z_wing
title: more a technic set
review:
what I mean is that this set only has two system pieces. there are the headlight (which is a round tile piece with a sticker) and the 2x2 round brick. and believe it or not all the other pieces are technic. I am not sure if the tyres are system but I don't think the are. I am not really bothered about the fact this set only has two system pieces it's just I thought racers sets had more system pieces. 

bike
pros: has a pull back motor
cons: none

pieces
pros: claw pieces, exhausts
cons: none

build
pros: strong, not easy but not hard
cons: none

price
pros: cheap, worth it
cons: none

I recommend this set to any racers fan
ps: if you hate stickers read on
this set does have stickers but I did not put this down as a con because I like stickers and you are not seeing things, I really do like stickers!
